mapper.select: select e.id, e.ename, e.cell, e.deptid, d.dname, to_char(e.hiredate,'YYYY-MM-DD') hiredate from superEmp e, superDept d where e.deptid = d.deptid AND e.ename like '%'||#{ename}||'%' and d.dname like '%'||#{dname}||'%' AND to_char(hiredate) like '%'||#{hiredate}||'%' and d.dname NOT LIKE '최고경영진'
